Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

Our AI Software Engineers and Senior AI Software Engineers are part of our rapidly growing engineering team and help to build the next generation of AI solutions. You‚Äôll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions. Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X.

We Are Looking For Dedicated Individuals With a Passion For Software Development, Large-scale Data Analytics And Redefining Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following

  • Apply software development practices and standards to develop robust and maintainable software
  • Actively involved in every part of the software development process
  • Experienced at guiding non-technical teams and consultants in and best practices for robust software development
  • Optimize and enhance computational efficiency of algorithms and software design
  • Motivated by a fast-paced, service-oriented environment and interacting directly with clients on new features for future product releases
  • Enjoy collaborating in teams to share software design and solution ideas
  • A natural problem-solver and intellectually curious across a breadth of industries and topics
  • Fluency in both Italian and English

#BCGXjob

What You'll Bring

Requirements

Master‚Äôs or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field

Technologies

  • Programming: Python, Java/Scala
  • Frameworks/Libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Keras
  • Data Processing: NumPy, Pandas, Apache Spark, Dask
  • Cloud Platforms: AWS (SageMaker, EC2), GCP (AI Platform), Azure (ML Studio)
  • DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins
  • Data Visualization: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly/Dash, Tableau
  • Tools: Jupyter Notebooks, Google Colab, Git (GitHub/GitLab), MLflow, TensorBoard
  • Deployment: Flask, FastAPI, TensorFlow Serving, Streamlit

#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

Title: Data Scientist ‚Äì Specialist in NLP e GenAI
Description:
Data Scientist ‚Äì Specialist in NLP e GenAI







Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?

Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.

Prometeia is looking for professionals to join the team dedicated to Natural Language Processing (NLP) and the development of innovative solutions related to this technology. We are looking for candidates with advanced skills in software engineering and experience in NLP, Generative AI, Machine Learning and big data management.




ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES:




‚Ä¢ Development of Artificial Intelligence (AI) prototypes for real-time analysis of large amounts of data, with a focus on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Generative AI services.

‚Ä¢ Collaboration with data engineers and researchers to implement solutions based on cutting-edge AI and NLP techniques

‚Ä¢ Designing and developing models for improving the efficiency and quality of analysed text data




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:




‚Ä¢ Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or STEM disciplines

‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience in NLP and Machine Learning

‚Ä¢ Excellent software development skills, preferably in Python, and use of versioning systems (git)

‚Ä¢ Experience with NLP/ML tools and libraries such as scikit-learn, Spacy, HuggingFace, LangChain, LangGraph, OpenAI API

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of machine learning and NLP algorithms: classification, clustering, tokenization, parsing, embedding and chatbots (RAG and GraphRAG)

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (preferably Microsoft Azure)

‚Ä¢ Ability to rapidly prototype solutions, critically analyse data and apply creative approaches in solving complex problems

‚Ä¢ Experience in managing NLP projects in agile contexts and with multidisciplinary teams




SOFT SKILLS

‚Ä¢ A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.

‚Ä¢ Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.

‚Ä¢ A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.

‚Ä¢ Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.




LOCATION:

Bologna/ Milano




WHAT WE OFFER:

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 ‚Äì we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of people and their continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Transparent discussions between managers and team members are set up within the projects, where reciprocal and timely feedback is exchanged. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the development trajectory of the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means ongoing training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. Particular attention is paid to younger colleagues, who are the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important, through immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees, and you recommend a person who is later recruited, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

Through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia, we have completely digitalized and integrated the management of our physical and virtual environments. Access to the office, smart working, workstations, meeting rooms, car pooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is extremely diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations that are directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities with which we actively collaborate, are stakeholders representing a great value for us, in terms of trust

and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the selection phase to everyday life, also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and unicities.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, the territories and the communities in which we operate. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards that recognizes the performance of the building in terms of energy and water savings, reduction of CO2 emissions, improvement of the ecological quality of the interior, materials and resources used. In the Sustainability Report we report the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda that, drafted by the United Nations in 2016, we have been supporting since 2020.

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Smart Solutions Lab di Deloitte Business Solution nella sedi di Milano e Roma che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

All‚Äôinterno del team ci si impegna a definire l'avanguardia delle soluzioni aziendali attraverso l'uso innovativo di concetti di intelligenza artificiale, Robotics Process Automation (RPA) e Optical Character Recognition (OCR). Oltre all'automazione dei processi, una parte delle attivit√† produttive si concentra sulla creazione di dashboard avanzate in ambito analytics tramite l‚Äôutilizzo di strumenti come PowerBI o Qlik Sense. La Data Visualization √® cruciale per rendere i dati comprensibili, utili e facilmente fruibili da parte dei clienti.

Your Role

Winning Requirements

Disponibilit√† a viaggiare in Italia e all'estero

Conoscenza del linguaggio SQL e utilizzo di SQL Server

Title: Doers
Description:
Milan (IT)

Octopus Energy Italia üáÆüáπ ‚Äì Candidatura Spontanea /

Full-time /

Hybrid



Benvenuti nel futuro dell‚Äôenergia!

La missione di Octopus Energy √® rendere l‚Äôenergia rinnovabile accessibile a tutti.

Grazie alla tecnologia, stiamo guidando la rivoluzione energetica a livello globale, offrendo energia pulita a prezzi convenienti e un servizio clienti sbalorditivo.

Se non ti piacciono le sfide non inviarci la tua candidatura ;)

In Octopus Energy non amiamo la burocrazia, le regole troppo stringenti e le offerte commerciali poco chiare.

Vogliamo rivoluzionare il mercato energetico italiano. Per farlo, siamo alla ricerca di persone motivate, che condividano i nostri stessi valori.

Se hai a cuore il futuro del nostro pianeta e vuoi aiutarci a migliorare il settore energetico, unisciti al nostro team!

La nostra missione √® trasformare le idee in realt√† e creare soluzioni innovative che fanno la differenza.

Siamo alla ricerca di persone intraprendenti, che non hanno paura di sporcarsi le mani e che amano fare, inventare e costruire. Se sei una persona pratica e hai la passione per la creativit√† e l'innovazione, allora sei nel posto giusto!

In un ambiente dinamico e senza burocrazia, potrai dare sfogo alla tua curiosit√†, sperimentare nuove idee e vedere i tuoi progetti prendere vita. Non ci piacciono le regole rigide, preferiamo l'azione e la concretezza.

Cosa sai fare:


Dimostrata abilit√† nel realizzare progetti concreti e innovativi.
Capacit√† di prendere in mano qualcosa di destrutturato e trasformarlo in un progetto organizzato.
Competenze nell'uso di sistemi low-code per sviluppare soluzioni rapide ed efficaci.
Abilit√† di gestione dei progetti (project management skills), inclusa la pianificazione, l'esecuzione e il monitoraggio.
Esperienza nel risolvere problemi in modo creativo e pratico.
Attitudine a lavorare in un ambiente dinamico e in continua evoluzione.
Forte orientamento ai risultati e alla qualit√†.
Capacit√† di collaborare con team interdisciplinari per sviluppare soluzioni integrate.
Abilit√† nella raccolta e analisi dei dati per migliorare i processi e le soluzioni.



Inviaci il tuo CV e raccontaci qualcosa di te e delle tue passioni. Se questo annuncio ti rispecchia, non vediamo l'ora di conoscere te e le tue idee!

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
It‚Äôs time to level up!

Siamo Leviathan, una marketing company che unisce creativit√†, strategia e tecnologia per costruire soluzioni uniche e scalabili per i brand.

Crediamo nell‚ÄôAI non come moda, ma come leva concreta per semplificare processi e creare nuovi prodotti.

Per questo cerchiamo un* AI Engineer / Developer con cui dare vita a nuovi tool interni e prodotti proprietari. Partiremo insieme da prototipi rapidi (come il nostro Leviathan Estimator) per poi sviluppare piccole applicazioni headless e soluzioni integrate nei processi di marketing e business.




CHI SEI TU

Sei un* developer con passione per l‚ÄôAI e voglia di sporcarsi le mani su progetti reali.
Segui da vicino le novit√† del settore e ti entusiasma l‚Äôidea di sperimentare con modelli e API.
Ti piace costruire cose concrete: non solo slide, ma prototipi, tool e demo.
Sai bilanciare approccio tecnico e visione: capisci il ‚Äúperch√©‚Äù dietro ogni progetto.
Sei curioso, flessibile e a tuo agio in contesti dinamici e multidisciplinari.




COMPETENZE CHE CERCHIAMO

Solida base di programmazione (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript o simili).
Esperienza con API di AI (OpenAI, Anthropic, HuggingFace, ecc.).
Conoscenza di framework moderni per sviluppo web/app (es. Next.js, FastAPI, Flask, Node.js).
Abitudine a lavorare con integrazioni e servizi (es. Zapier, Make, webhooks).
Conoscenza di database (SQL o NoSQL) e di architetture serverless/cloud.




PLUS

Esperienza in ML ops, fine-tuning di modelli o vector databases (es. Pinecone, Weaviate).
Competenze in UX / UI o capacit√† di prototipare interfacce base.
Conoscenza di data engineering e pipeline di automazione.
Background in marketing tech o sviluppo di prodotti SaaS




COSA FARAI CON NOI

Svilupperai e testerai nuovi tool AI interni ed esterni (da prototipi rapidi a piccoli prodotti headless).
Trasformerai idee in MVP funzionanti pronti per essere validati su clienti e team.
Collaborerai con strategisti, designer e performance specialist per integrare l‚ÄôAI nei processi.
Documenterai e migliorerai i flussi, rendendo i prodotti scalabili e manutenibili.
Avrai voce attiva nella roadmap dei prodotti AI di Leviathan.




COSA OFFRIAMO

Opportunit√† di lavorare su progetti unici, tra creativit√† e tecnologia.
Spazio per sperimentare con API, modelli e framework all‚Äôavanguardia.
Formazione continua e accesso a tool AI premium.
Un ambiente giovane, dinamico e orientato al risultato.

HTML:
It‚Äôs time to level up!

Siamo Leviathan, una marketing company che unisce creativit√†, strategia e tecnologia per costruire soluzioni uniche e scalabili per i brand.

Crediamo nell‚ÄôAI non come moda, ma come leva concreta per semplificare processi e creare nuovi prodotti.

Per questo cerchiamo un* AI Engineer / Developer con cui dare vita a nuovi tool interni e prodotti proprietari. Partiremo insieme da prototipi rapidi (come il nostro Leviathan Estimator) per poi sviluppare piccole applicazioni headless e soluzioni integrate nei processi di marketing e business.


CHI SEI TU

  • Sei un* developer con passione per l‚ÄôAI e voglia di sporcarsi le mani su progetti reali.
  • Segui da vicino le novit√† del settore e ti entusiasma l‚Äôidea di sperimentare con modelli e API.
  • Ti piace costruire cose concrete: non solo slide, ma prototipi, tool e demo.
  • Sai bilanciare approccio tecnico e visione: capisci il ‚Äúperch√©‚Äù dietro ogni progetto.
  • Sei curioso, flessibile e a tuo agio in contesti dinamici e multidisciplinari.


COMPETENZE CHE CERCHIAMO

  • Solida base di programmazione (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript o simili).
  • Esperienza con API di AI (OpenAI, Anthropic, HuggingFace, ecc.).
  • Conoscenza di framework moderni per sviluppo web/app (es. Next.js, FastAPI, Flask, Node.js).
  • Abitudine a lavorare con integrazioni e servizi (es. Zapier, Make, webhooks).
  • Conoscenza di database (SQL o NoSQL) e di architetture serverless/cloud.


PLUS

  • Esperienza in ML ops, fine-tuning di modelli o vector databases (es. Pinecone, Weaviate).
  • Competenze in UX / UI o capacit√† di prototipare interfacce base.
  • Conoscenza di data engineering e pipeline di automazione.
  • Background in marketing tech o sviluppo di prodotti SaaS


COSA FARAI CON NOI

  • Svilupperai e testerai nuovi tool AI interni ed esterni (da prototipi rapidi a piccoli prodotti headless).
  • Trasformerai idee in MVP funzionanti pronti per essere validati su clienti e team.
  • Collaborerai con strategisti, designer e performance specialist per integrare l‚ÄôAI nei processi.
  • Documenterai e migliorerai i flussi, rendendo i prodotti scalabili e manutenibili.
  • Avrai voce attiva nella roadmap dei prodotti AI di Leviathan.


COSA OFFRIAMO

  • Opportunit√† di lavorare su progetti unici, tra creativit√† e tecnologia.
  • Spazio per sperimentare con API, modelli e framework all‚Äôavanguardia.
  • Formazione continua e accesso a tool AI premium.
  • Un ambiente giovane, dinamico e orientato al risultato.
  • Possibilit√† di lavorare ibrido (sede a Caronno Pertusella - VA).
  • Frutta, acqua e zero ansia da meeting üçâ

Inviaci un progetto, repo GitHub, demo o anche solo un prototipo AI che racconti chi sei e cosa sai fare.

Title: Addetto/a centro studi - dati
Description:
Adecco Team Explora √® alla ricerca di una risorsa da inserire all'interno di un'associazione di categoria con il ruolo di Addetto/a centro studi - dati. La figura si occuper√† principalmente di raccolta, gestione e analisi di dati relativi al mercato e alle influenze politiche globali che impattano i settori dei clienti (acciaio, raccolta metalli, serramenta, alluminio e altri comparti affini).

Responsabilit√† principali:

Raccolta ed elaborazione di dati economici e di mercato.
Organizzazione strutturata e dettagliata dei dati raccolti.
Analisi dei trend e delle possibili implicazioni politiche ed economiche a supporto delle attivit√† aziendali.
In una fase successiva, a seguito di formazione interna, possibilit√† di contribuire alla redazione di reportistica e presentazioni destinate ai clienti.

Requisiti richiesti:

Laurea in discipline economiche e/o statistiche.
Buona capacit√† di analisi e interpretazione dei dati in chiave economico-politica.
Attitudine al lavoro strutturato e alla gestione di informazioni complesse nel tempo.
Disponibilit√† a rare trasferte in Italia ed all‚Äôestero.

Inquadramento contrattuale:

Contratto a tempo determinato di 12 mesi con prospettiva di successiva stabilizzazione a tempo indeterminato, CCNL Commercio

Orario di lavoro: full time, luned√¨-venerd√¨

Luogo di lavoro: Milano (zona metro Dateo-Susa)

Cosa offrono:

Percorso di formazione specifico sul settore e sul contesto operativo.
Opportunit√† di crescita professionale in un ambiente dinamico e di respiro internazionale.

Possibilit√† di acquisire competenze trasversali nell‚Äôanalisi dei mercati e nell‚Äôinterpretazione delle dinamiche politico-economiche globali.







I candidati, nel rispetto del D.lgs. 198/2006, D.lgs 215/2003 e D.lgs 216/2003, sono invitati a leggere l'informativa sulla privacy consultabile sotto il form di richiesta dati della pagina di candidatura (Regolamento UE n. 2016/679).

Title: Artificial Intelligence Researcher
Description:
Artificial Intelligence Researcher (LLM Fine-Tuning Specialist)




Solomei AI creates a new generation of websites, combining human creativity and advanced AI. Our platform leverages AI agents built on advanced AI technologies, enabling dynamic and effective content presentation. As we continue to grow, we're seeking talented individuals who are excited to innovate at the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence.




Complex Problems You‚Äôll Be Leading

Design, build, and maintain high-quality datasets specifically tailored for fine-tuning transformer-based LLMs (LLaMA, Mistral).
Develop and manage sophisticated fine-tuning pipelines (LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT), ensuring performance, scalability, and deployment efficiency.
Solve optimization challenges in fine-tuning, including parameter-efficient techniques and distillation strategies.




In This Role, You Will

Lead and implement advanced fine-tuning and distillation techniques (e.g., LoRA, QLoRA, adapter modules) on transformer architectures.
Oversee dataset quality assurance processes explicitly for transformer fine-tuning tasks.
Create rigorous evaluation frameworks to benchmark model accuracy, efficiency, and robustness post-fine-tuning.
Collaborate directly with GPU cloud providers to optimize LLM training and inference.
Collaborate with product teams, translating product goals into technical fine-tuning requirements.




You Are a Great Fit If You Have

Master or PhD or in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or related fields.
3+ years leading large-scale data initiatives, including pipeline architecture and quality assurance.
Proven expertise applying parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques such as LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT, adapters, etc.
Advanced proficiency with PyTorch, Hugging Face, and cloud-based deployments.
Proven leadership and independent project management skills.

Show more

Title: DATA SCIENTIST - Sr Analyst/Specialist
Description:
DATA SCIENTIST - Sr Analyst/Specialist




Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?

Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.

We are looking for motivated and talented Data Scientists to join our Data Science team. You will have the opportunity to work on complex and innovative projects, using cutting-edge tools and collaborating with high-level professionals to face the challenges of the global financial market. If you are looking for a challenging environment where your curiosity and creativity can make a difference, this is the right opportunity for you.




RESPONSIBILITIES:




‚óè Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data in banking and insurance, identifying useful patterns and insights to support business processes and decisions.

‚óè Design, develop and implement advanced machine learning, data mining and statistical models to solve complex problems in finance.

‚óè Collaborate in cross-functional teams to define project requirements and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Contribute to the development of proprietary frameworks and algorithms to improve the performance of solutions offered to our clients.

‚óè Present complex results to technical and non-technical stakeholders, making analysis results understandable.

‚óè Support customers in implementing solutions, ensuring knowledge transfer and customization.

‚óè Coordinate project activities effectively with internal and external clients.




REQUIREMENTS:




‚óè Proven experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration and feature extraction.

‚óè Proven experience in processing and modeling with structured data.

‚óè Excellent knowledge of Python and the most important analytical libraries (pandas, numpy, sklearn, shap).

‚óè Experience with code versioning systems (git).

‚óè Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms, with special focus on supervised learning models.

‚óè Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, predictive modeling with the application of Machine Learning models, and data analysis.

‚óè Knowledge of at least one major cloud environment (Azure, GCP, AWS).

‚óè Ability to creatively solve complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Ability to rapidly prototype ideas/solutions with a critical/experimental approach to data analysis.

‚óè Good communication skills and ability to translate technical results into insights for non-experts, and meticulous attention to detail.

‚óè Aptitude for teamwork, with strong orientation toward interdisciplinary collaboration.







NICE TO HAVE:




‚óè Experience in Pyspark development and working in big data platforms.

‚óè Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision).

‚óè Preferred experience in a consultancy company.




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:




‚óè Master's degree or PhD with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields

‚óè At least 3-5 years of professional experience, ideally in the financial or insurance sector.




LOCATION:

Milan




WHAT WE OFFER:




COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT




Our history, as well as our future, is based on the value of our people. Prometeia‚Äôs biggest investment is in our people and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it ‚ÄúTotal Compensation‚Äù and it is made of three elements: Compensation, consisting of a fixed and a variable component, a Welfare Plan active since 2015 ‚Äìwe were among the first companies in Italy to introduce it‚Äì, and Benefits, including all initiatives for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of our way of working. In Prometeia, remote working is an organizational method based on trust. It results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of our people and on continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Within the projects, several moments are dedicated to transparent discussions between managers and team members. This allows for reciprocal and prompt feedback. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the strategic growth of both the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means continuous training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. We pay specific attention to younger colleagues, the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important and is made of immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees and you recommend a person who is later hired, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

We have completely digitalized the management of our physical and virtual environments through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia. Access to the office, remote working, workstations, meeting rooms, carpooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is highly diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities we actively cooperate with are stakeholders representing a great value for us in terms of trust and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the recruitment phase to everyday life, promoted also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and uniqueness.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, territories and communities we operate in. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards recognizing the efficiency of the building in terms of energy and water savings, CO2 emissions reduction, and improvement of the ecological quality of interiors, materials and resources. In the Sustainability Report we outline the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda drafted by the UN in 2016, that we have been supporting since 2020.

Title: Senior Deep Learning Engineer
Description:
Descrizione azienda

FinecoBank √® una banca multicanale che offre, in un unico conto, servizi di banking, credit, trading e investimento. E‚Äô leader in Europa nel brokerage e dispone di una delle maggiori reti di consulenti finanziari, con un network capillare di Fineco Center in tutta Italia. FinecoBank √® una delle pi√π importanti banche FinTech in Europa, oltre ad essere uno dei pi√π importanti player nel Private Banking in Italia, con un approccio consulenziale altamente tailor-made che include servizi fiduciari, di protezione e trasmissione del patrimonio personale e aziendale, consulenza legale e fiscale e gestione degli eventi di discontinuit√†.

Posizione

Siamo alla ricerca di un Senior Deep Learning Engineer altamente qualificato per unirsi al nostro team di AI.

Il candidato ideale avr√† una solida esperienza in reti neurali, transformer e modelli di linguaggio di grandi dimensioni (LLM). Sar√† responsabile dello sviluppo di progetti innovativi che avranno come focus l‚Äôapplicazione di modelli pre-addestrati e del training end-to-end di reti neurali con architetture Encoder o Decoder.

Fineco √® rinomata per le sue soluzioni innovative nel settore bancario, offrendo servizi di conto corrente, carte di pagamento, investimenti e trading. Con un ambiente di lavoro dinamico e collaborativo, Fineco √® al primo posto tra le banche italiane secondo Forbes.

Responsabilit√†


Progettare, sviluppare e implementare modelli di deep learning avanzati.
Eseguire il training end-to-end di reti neurali utilizzando architetture Encoder o Decoder.
Ottimizzare le prestazioni dei modelli e migliorare la loro efficienza.
Collaborare con altri team per integrare soluzioni di AI nei prodotti aziendali.
Mantenere aggiornate le conoscenze sulle ultime tecnologie e tendenze nel campo del deep learning.



Requisiti


Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria, o campo correlato.
Esperienza comprovata nello sviluppo e nel training di modelli di deep learning.
Conoscenza approfondita di reti neurali, transformer e LLM.
Esperienza con architetture Encoder e Decoder.
Esperienza documentata in ambito aziendale, preferibilmente bancario.
Capacit√† di analisi, implementazione e presentazione dei risultati a stakeholder business.
Esperienza con modelli di computer vision o multimodali.
Capacit√† di lavorare in modo indipendente e in team.
Eccellenti capacit√† di problem-solving e analitiche.
Buona conoscenza di linguaggi di programmazione come Python e framework di deep learning come PyTorch.



Altre informazioni

Cosa Offriamo


Opportunit√† di lavorare su progetti innovativi e all'avanguardia.
Ambiente di lavoro dinamico e collaborativo.
Opportunit√† di crescita professionale e formazione continua.
Pacchetto retributivo competitivo e benefit aziendali.



Sede di lavoro: Milano (alternanza presenza in sede e smart working)

Il Gruppo Fineco √® orgoglioso di essere un Equal Opportunity Employer e si impegna a creare un ambiente di lavoro sicuro e inclusivo, fondato sul rispetto reciproco e la valorizzazione di qualsiasi diversit√†, offrendo pari opportunit√† di lavoro. Fineco ‚ÄúThe Place To Be‚Äù

  • Capacit√† di analisi, implementazione e presentazione dei risultati a stakeholder business.
  • Esperienza con modelli di computer vision o multimodali.
  • Capacit√† di lavorare in modo indipendente e in team.
  • Eccellenti capacit√† di problem-solving e analitiche.
  • Buona conoscenza di linguaggi di programmazione come Python e framework di deep learning come PyTorch.


Altre informazioni

Cosa Offriamo

  • Opportunit√† di lavorare su progetti innovativi e all'avanguardia.
  • Ambiente di lavoro dinamico e collaborativo.
  • Opportunit√† di crescita professionale e formazione continua.
  • Pacchetto retributivo competitivo e benefit aziendali.


Sede di lavoro: Milano (alternanza presenza in sede e smart working)

Title: Data Scientist, Italy - BCG X
Description:
Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures‚Äîand business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

We Are BCG X

We‚Äôre a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world‚Äôs most complex problems. Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

Our Data Scientists and Senior Data Scientist are part of our rapidly growing team to apply data science methods and analytics to real-world business situations across industries to drive significant business impact. You'll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions.

Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X. Successful candidates are intellectually curious builders who are biased toward action, creative, and communicative.

We Are Looking For Dedicated Individuals With a Passion For Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research And Redefining Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following


Comfortable in a client-facing role with the ambition to lead teams
Likes to distill complex results or processes into simple, clear visualizations
Explain sophisticated data science concepts in an understandable manner
Love building things and are comfortable working with modern development tools and writing code collaboratively (bonus points if you have a software development or DevOps experience)
Significant experience applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations and a proven ability to synthesize complex data
Deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings, and can translate this into business implications for our clients
Have strong project management skills
Fluency in both Italian and English


#BCGXjob

What You'll Bring

Requirements

Master‚Äôs or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field

Technologies


Programming: Python


#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
About Prestatech




At Prestatech, we're redefining the financial world by fostering innovation and challenging the traditional banking system. Our culture is diverse, dynamic, and forward-thinking. From our offices in Berlin and Milan, we create cutting-edge API technologies in an inclusive environment where everyone can contribute their best work.




Founded in 2021 by Christian Nothacker, Luca Terragni, and Lorenzo Giusti, Prestatech combines document automation and proprietary technology to help financial institutions and B2B companies make quick, reliable, and inclusive credit decisions for SMEs and consumers.




When most people think of getting a loan or mortgage, they picture a slow and tedious process. Our mission is to simplify that through technology.




We‚Äôre a young and fast-growing company‚Äîbut this is our second venture. Before Prestatech, we founded and exited Prestacap, a lending platform for SMEs active in Italy and Germany.




We‚Äôre passionate about data and technology, never satisfied with the status quo, and believe that teamwork is key to achieving ambitious goals together.




To date, we have raised ‚Ç¨8 million, which is helping us bring more innovative solutions to market, expand operations in Italy, and launch in the UK, Germany, and the US..




We‚Äôre now looking for a Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d), someone with prior experience in fintech who is hands-on, outcome-driven, and deeply curious about solving business problems with data and AI.


Tasks


You would be joining a flexible and dynamic team and your role will include:





selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques


processing, cleansing and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis


deep dive on the problems using SQL and scripting languages to drive solutions leveraging Statistical Analysis


implement and scale data pipelines and solutions using Big Data technologies


design, train, and deploy machine learning models and AI-based solutions for credit scoring, fraud detection, and other core financial applications.


collaborate closely with the development team to recommend and build innovations based on Data Science


own the process: identify and execute on high impact projects, triage external requests, and make sure you bring projects to conclusion in time for the results to be useful


leverage AI tools to achieve even better and faster results



Requirements



6+ years of experience in Data Science, ideally in fintech or financial services


Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or related field (MSc/PhD preferred)


Strong understanding of Big Data frameworks and cloud platforms.


Expertise in machine learning and AI techniques


Proficient in Python, with hands-on experience using Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn


Skilled in working with SQL/NoSQL databases


Experience with version control (Git) and writing clean, maintainable code


Experience with financial datasets, credit scoring, or risk modeling is a strong plus





Not sure you meet evert single requirement? Don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî if this role excites you and you believe you could be a good fit, we‚Äôd still love to hear from you. At Prestatech, we value potential, curiosity, and passion just as much as experience.


Benefits



Excellent compensation aligned with your experience and impact


A career path that allows you to take yourself to the next level


Annual training budget to help you grow and develop


2 days per week of Smart Working (+ 3 days at the office)


Flexible working arrangements, with the understanding that building a successful startup sometimes requires periods of focused, intense work


Bi-annual company offsites


Referral bonus


a co-working office in one of the best district of Milan (Isola)





Recruitment Process:





HR Interview (30 minutes)


Assessment Test (up to 60 minutes)


CEO/CTO Interview (30 minutes)





If you have any specific requirements or need accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know ‚Äî we‚Äôre happy to support you.




At Prestatech, we actively embrace diversity and are committed to fostering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming workplace for everyone. Our recruitment process is free from discrimination of any kind ‚Äî including on the basis of race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.




With over 25 employees from more than 15 different countries, our diversity drives innovation, enriches our culture, and challenges us to consider multiple perspectives every day.

Title: JR Research & Development- parte analisi | Settore Farmaceutico | Cologno
HTML:
Jobtech, agenzia digitale per il lavoro, √® alla ricerca di due risorse da inserirenel dipartiment di R&D - parte Analisi per un'importante realt√† che opera nel settore chimico-farmaceutico, situata a Cologno Monzese (MI).


Cosa prevede l'offerta?


  • Tipologia di inserimento: RAL da commisurare in base ad esperienza pregressa nel ruolo + Ticket elettronici pari a 8‚Ç¨ + Premio di produzione annuale di cui massimo importo 2.000‚Ç¨. + Premio welfare annuale : 200‚Ç¨.
  • Giorni e orari di lavoro: Lavoro a giornata lun- venerdi (39 ore settimanali) entrata flessibile 7.45- 09.30 pausa pranzo da 45 min fino a 1.5h, il venerd√¨ 7 ore.
  • Periodo di inizio: settembre 2025. Avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di entrare a far parte di un'azienda leader nel settore chimico-farmaceutico, dinamica e impegnata nell'innovazione continua.


Cosa vorremmo trovare in te?


  • Laurea in discipline scientifiche (Chimica, CTF, Farmacia, Biotecnologie Farmaceutiche);
  • Esperienza di almeno 1 anno in ruoli analoghi;
  • Buone capacit√† organizzative;
  • Eccellenti doti di lavoro in team;
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (scritta e parlata), livello B2;
  • Automunito/a.


Di cosa ti occuperai?


  • Collabora nello sviluppo, messa a punto e convalida dei metodi analitici;
  • Collabora nell‚Äôeffettuare analisi e identificazioni di sostanze incognite;
  • Collabora nell‚Äôeffettuare valutazioni di carryover di impurezze e di degradazioni forzate;
  • Svolge ogni attivit√† di supporto analitico volta all‚Äôacquisizione di nuove conoscenze e alla risoluzione di problematiche;
  • Collabora nell‚Äôeffettuare controlli di processo e troubleshooting;
  • Effettua la stesura di report analitici con la supervisione dell‚ÄôR&D Analytical Senior e dell‚ÄôR&D Analytical Supervisor;
  • Rispetta le normative GMP (ove richiesto) e quanto stabilito in termini di vestizione e sicurezza nell‚Äôambito delle proprie attivit√†.
  • Esegue la calibrazione interna degli strumenti analitici


Se pensi che questa possa essere l‚Äôopportunit√† giusta per te, candidati subito.


Jobtech √® un'Agenzia per il lavoro improntata alle pari opportunit√†: diversit√† e inclusione sono al primo posto per noi! Ogni candidatura, per ogni posizione aperta, sar√† accolta e considerata sulla base degli effettivi meriti e competenze, nel rispetto delle specificit√† di ciascun ruolo a prescindere da pelle, razza, nazionalit√†, etnia, sesso, genere, orientamento sessuale, stato coniugale, disabilit√†, responsabilit√† genitoriali, et√†, religione o credo.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist




Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?




Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.




RESPONSIBILITIES:




‚óè Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data in banking and insurance, identifying useful patterns and insights to support business processes and decisions.

‚óè Design, develop and implement advanced machine learning, data mining and statistical models to solve complex problems in finance.

‚óè Collaborate in cross-functional teams to define project requirements and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Contribute to the development of proprietary frameworks and algorithms to improve the performance of solutions offered to our clients.

‚óè Present complex results to technical and non-technical stakeholders, making analysis results understandable.

‚óè Support customers in implementing solutions, ensuring knowledge transfer and customization.




REQUIREMENTS:




‚óè Experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration and feature extraction.

‚óè Excellent knowledge of Python and the most important analytical libraries.

‚óè Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms

‚óè Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, predictive modeling with the application of Machine Learning models, and data analysis.

‚óè Ability to creatively solve complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Ability to rapidly prototype ideas/solutions with a critical/experimental approach to data analysis.

‚óè Good communication skills and ability to translate technical results into insights for non-experts.

‚óè Aptitude for teamwork, with strong orientation toward interdisciplinary collaboration.

‚óè At least one year of working experience in applied ML projects.




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

‚óè Master's degree or PhD with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields




NICE TO HAVE:

‚óè Experience with code versioning systems (git).

‚óè Experience in Pyspark development and working in big data platforms.

‚óè Knowledge of at least one major cloud environment (Azure, GCP, AWS).

‚óè Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision)




SOFT SKILLS:

A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.
A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.







LOCATION:

Milan




WHAT WE OFFER:

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 ‚Äì we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.




REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.




PEOPLE PROGRAM

Our evaluation system is based on the full enhancement of people and their continuous dialogue as a stimulus for regular, mutual professional and personal growth. Transparent discussions between managers and team members are set up within the projects, where reciprocal and timely feedback is exchanged. The process is fully digitalized and aimed at continuously improving the development trajectory of the individual and the company.




TRAINING

Prometeia means ongoing training. We provide an average of 11 days of training per year to our people, in person and online. Particular attention is paid to younger colleagues, who are the protagonists of dedicated growth programs, and to the continuous sharing and internal transfer of know-how and skills. On-the-job training is also important, through immediate and direct confrontation with the market.




WIN/WIN POLICY

If you are one of our employees, and you recommend a person who is later recruited, you are entitled to a financial bonus! This is an important opportunity to contribute to the growth of Prometeia as a whole, by attracting acknowledged market professionals and new tech talents.




PHYGITAL MANAGEMENT

Through the dedicated app Pr(Home)teia, we have completely digitalized and integrated the management of our physical and virtual environments. Access to the office, smart working, workstations, meeting rooms, car pooling... everything is just a click away.




COMMUNITY

Our Community is extremely diverse, as are the skills of the people who are part of it and who share its values, and the individuals and organizations that are directly or indirectly involved in our activities. Clients, People of the Group, Alumni, Institutions, Academia, non-profit entities with which we actively collaborate, are stakeholders representing a great value for us, in terms of trust and collaboration.




DIVERSITY

We promote and respect equal opportunities and consider differences as a value. Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental values: from the selection phase to everyday life, also through dedicated training moments to develop individual sensitivities and unicities.




IMPACT

We responsibly take an active role towards the environment, the territories and the communities in which we operate. Our Headquarter in Bologna has obtained the Leed Gold Certification, one of the highest awards that recognizes the performance of the building in terms of energy and water savings, reduction of CO2 emissions, improvement of the ecological quality of the interior, materials and resources used. In the Sustainability Report we report the results achieved within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the 2030 Agenda that, drafted by the United Nations in 2016, we have been supporting since 2020.

HTML:
Data Scientist


Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?


Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.


RESPONSIBILITIES:


‚óè Analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data in banking and insurance, identifying useful patterns and insights to support business processes and decisions.

‚óè Design, develop and implement advanced machine learning, data mining and statistical models to solve complex problems in finance.

‚óè Collaborate in cross-functional teams to define project requirements and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Contribute to the development of proprietary frameworks and algorithms to improve the performance of solutions offered to our clients.

‚óè Present complex results to technical and non-technical stakeholders, making analysis results understandable.

‚óè Support customers in implementing solutions, ensuring knowledge transfer and customization.


REQUIREMENTS:


‚óè Experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration and feature extraction.

‚óè Excellent knowledge of Python and the most important analytical libraries.

‚óè Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms

‚óè Advanced knowledge of statistical techniques, predictive modeling with the application of Machine Learning models, and data analysis.

‚óè Ability to creatively solve complex problems and propose innovative solutions.

‚óè Ability to rapidly prototype ideas/solutions with a critical/experimental approach to data analysis.

‚óè Good communication skills and ability to translate technical results into insights for non-experts.

‚óè Aptitude for teamwork, with strong orientation toward interdisciplinary collaboration.

‚óè At least one year of working experience in applied ML projects.


EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

‚óè Master's degree or PhD with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields


NICE TO HAVE:

‚óè Experience with code versioning systems (git).

‚óè Experience in Pyspark development and working in big data platforms.

‚óè Knowledge of at least one major cloud environment (Azure, GCP, AWS).

‚óè Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision)


SOFT SKILLS:

  • A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
  • Exceptional communication skills and meticulous attention to detail.
  • A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Passionate about process innovation and driven by curiosity to understand and optimize business processes.



LOCATION:

Milan

COMPENSATION, WELFARE & BENEFIT

Our history, as well as the future, is based on the value of our people. The biggest investment at Prometeia is in our people, and it concerns every aspect of professional life. We call it 'Total Compensation' and is made up of Compensation - consisting of a fixed and a variable component -, an important Welfare Plan, active since 2015 ‚Äì we have been among the first to introduce it in Italy - and Benefits, which include all the initiatives undertaken for the well-being of our people.


REMOTE WORKING

Flexibility is an intrinsic value of the way we work. At Prometeia, smart working is an organizational method based on trust, which results in benefits in terms of work/life balance, impact on the environment and optimization of company results, through autonomy and empowerment of people.

Description:
MEET FIDES




Fides √® una tech company che da vent‚Äôanni si contraddistingue sul mercato per una doppia offerta di servizio: partnership consulenziali con i pi√π importanti system integrator internazionali e sviluppo di progetti IT custom.




Grazie a 20 anni di esperienza e oltre 300 risorse dislocate tra le sedi (Milano, Napoli, Roma e Torino), Fides si posiziona tra le principali aziende italiane Hi-tech.

In questo ruolo, contribuirai all‚Äôaddestramento, fine tuning e integrazione di LLM, sia locali (per garantire data sovereignty, sicurezza e conformit√† normativa in contesti altamente regolamentati) sia non locali, in base alle esigenze specifiche dei progetti. Le soluzioni saranno sviluppate su misura per i clienti, attraverso pipeline intelligenti e scalabili, perfettamente in linea con le evoluzioni pi√π recenti dell‚ÄôIntelligenza Artificiale.




TECHNICAL SKILLS




Buona conoscenza del linguaggio Python
Esperienza nell‚Äôutilizzo di LLM e AI generativa
Conoscenza (anche teorica) di tecniche di fine tuning di modelli
Familiarit√† con strumenti e framework come PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers
Utilizzo di strumenti per l‚Äôottimizzazione e l‚Äôaddestramento dei modelli (unsloth, deepspeed, LoRA, QLoRA, ecc.)
Conoscenze in ambito AI non generativa (costituisce un plus)
Interesse per le tecnologie emergenti e capacit√† di problem solving
Gradita esperienza con piattaforme cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Conoscenze generali di Java e familiarit√† con lo sviluppo di backend tramite framework quali Spring/Spring Boot (nice to have)
Esperienza (anche base) nella progettazione di soluzioni cloud-native e architetture distribuite (nice to have)




HUMAN SKILLS




Ottime doti comunicative e di problem solving
Predisposizione al lavoro in team
Conoscenza della lingua inglese
Proattivit√† e orientamento al risultato




WHY FIDES




Hybrid work
Buoni pasto e welfare contrattuale
Assicurazione sanitaria aggiuntiva
Feedback continuo orientato alla crescita
Ambiente di lavoro giovane e innovativo




HUMAN-CENTRIC COMPANY




Il nostro asset pi√π importante sono le persone e lavoriamo ogni giorno per migliorare il work-life balance delle nostre risorse. Fiducia, feedback e collaborazione sono valori strettamente connessi alla nostra idea di leadership e che rientrano nelle relazioni con le nostre persone e i nostri clienti e partner.




Livello e inquadramento saranno commisurati all'effettiva esperienza maturata.




Crediamo nei valori della diversit√† e dell‚Äôinclusione di genere e cultura prestando inoltre attenzione e sensibilit√† ai/alle candidati/e appartenenti alle categorie protette, ai sensi degli articoli 1 e 18 della legge 68 del ‚Äò99.I dati personali saranno trattati in conformit√† alle disposizioni contenute nel regolamento UE 2016/679.

Strategic Transformation & Innovation: supporto nella definizione di strategie innovative e sostenibili di business transformation volte alla creazione di valore delle aziende clienti con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottimizzare il proprio portafoglio prodotti, adottando un approccio orientato alla differenziazione;
Customer Strategy: supporto nella definizione e realizzazione di strategie e processi di trasformazione dei modelli di marketing, customer management e pricing;

M&A Strategy: supporto nella gestione dell‚Äôintero processo di M&A, dalla definizione della strategia fino alla selezione del giusto partner passando per la conduzione di una commercial due diligence approfondita, fino alla chiusura del deal e alla relativa gestione del programma di integrazione.

Brillante percorso accademico in ambito: Economico, Ingegneristico, Informatico, Fisico, Matematico o Statistico

In Deloitte la sostenibilit√† √® un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Researcher
Description:
Artificial Intelligence Researcher (LLM Fine-Tuning Specialist)




Solomei AI creates a new generation of websites, combining human creativity and advanced AI. Our platform leverages AI agents built on advanced AI technologies, enabling dynamic and effective content presentation. As we continue to grow, we're seeking talented individuals who are excited to innovate at the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence.




Complex Problems You‚Äôll Be Leading

Design, build, and maintain high-quality datasets specifically tailored for fine-tuning transformer-based LLMs (LLaMA, Mistral).
Develop and manage sophisticated fine-tuning pipelines (LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT), ensuring performance, scalability, and deployment efficiency.
Solve optimization challenges in fine-tuning, including parameter-efficient techniques and distillation strategies.




In This Role, You Will

Lead and implement advanced fine-tuning and distillation techniques (e.g., LoRA, QLoRA, adapter modules) on transformer architectures.
Oversee dataset quality assurance processes explicitly for transformer fine-tuning tasks.
Create rigorous evaluation frameworks to benchmark model accuracy, efficiency, and robustness post-fine-tuning.
Collaborate directly with GPU cloud providers to optimize LLM training and inference.
Collaborate with product teams, translating product goals into technical fine-tuning requirements.




You Are a Great Fit If You Have

Master or PhD or in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or related fields.
3+ years leading large-scale data initiatives, including pipeline architecture and quality assurance.
Proven expertise applying parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques such as LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT, adapters, etc.
Advanced proficiency with PyTorch, Hugging Face, and cloud-based deployments.
Proven leadership and independent project management skills.

Show more

Title: AI Research Engineer
Description:
At Bending Spoons, we‚Äôre striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.

To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform‚Äîwhich comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor‚Äôs attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.

For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That‚Äôs our promise to such a candidate.

A few examples of your responsibilities
Power digital products with AI. Work with product teams to identify high-impact opportunities where AI can transform the user experience for millions‚Äîand then build the solutions to make them happen. Drive the process from possibility to production, delivering code that‚Äôs robust, reproducible, and built for scale.
Explore ways to push the boundaries of our AI capabilities. Stay at the bleeding edge of AI by investigating new models, techniques, and research. Learn fast across new domains, share findings with the team, and turn breakthrough ideas into production systems that deliver real-world impact.
Refine data foundations for exceptional results. Own the full data lifecycle‚Äîfrom acquisition and labeling to loading and management‚Äîto ensure our models are trained on clean, high-quality datasets that power top-performing systems.
Own your impact, end-to-end. Set smart priorities, manage execution, and consistently deliver high-quality results, even in ambiguous or fast-changing environments. Balance technical depth with strong ownership, growing your skills while delivering meaningful contributions.


What we look for
Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
Drive. You‚Äôre extremely ambitious in everything you do‚Äîand your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high‚Äîand rising‚Äîbar.
Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You‚Äôre reliable, honest, and transparent.
Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.


What we offer
Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You‚Äôll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential‚Äîthen, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of ¬£66,779 in the UK and ‚Ç¨63,965 elsewhere. For a candidate that we assess as possessing considerable relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between ¬£110,389 and ¬£149,636 in the UK, and ‚Ç¨105,737 and ‚Ç¨143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


Commitment & contract
Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time or part-time.

Location
Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.

The selection process
If you pass our screening, we‚Äôll ask you to take on a few tests designed to assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. They‚Äôre challenging and may take several hours to complete. If you‚Äôre successful with those, we‚Äôll invite you to a series of interviews.

We set the bar high and won't extend an offer until we're convinced we've found the right candidate. This is why a job may stay open for months or be reposted several times.

Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn‚Äôt a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and provide reasonable accommodations for an individual with disabilities‚Äîjust let us know through this form.

Before you apply
If you‚Äôve applied before but didn't receive an offer, we recommend waiting at least one year before applying again.

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment. We‚Äôre extremely ambitious and we hold ourselves‚Äîand one another‚Äîto a high standard. While this tends to lead to extraordinary learning, achievement, and career growth, it also requires significant commitment.

To help you ramp up quickly and set yourself up for success, we recommend spending your first few months working from our Milan office, regardless of your long-term work location. It‚Äôs the best way to rapidly absorb our company culture and build trust with your new teammates. We‚Äôll support you with generous travel and accommodation assistance. After that, you‚Äôre welcome to work from our offices in Milan or London, or remotely from approved countries‚Äîdepending on what we agree at the offer stage.

If the role speaks to you and you‚Äôre excited to give your best, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Apply now‚Äîwe can‚Äôt wait to meet you.

At Bending Spoons, we‚Äôre striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.

To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform‚Äîwhich comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor‚Äôs attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.

For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That‚Äôs our promise to such a candidate.

A few examples of your responsibilities
  • Power digital products with AI. Work with product teams to identify high-impact opportunities where AI can transform the user experience for millions‚Äîand then build the solutions to make them happen. Drive the process from possibility to production, delivering code that‚Äôs robust, reproducible, and built for scale.
  • Explore ways to push the boundaries of our AI capabilities. Stay at the bleeding edge of AI by investigating new models, techniques, and research. Learn fast across new domains, share findings with the team, and turn breakthrough ideas into production systems that deliver real-world impact.
  • Refine data foundations for exceptional results. Own the full data lifecycle‚Äîfrom acquisition and labeling to loading and management‚Äîto ensure our models are trained on clean, high-quality datasets that power top-performing systems.
  • Own your impact, end-to-end. Set smart priorities, manage execution, and consistently deliver high-quality results, even in ambiguous or fast-changing environments. Balance technical depth with strong ownership, growing your skills while delivering meaningful contributions.

What we look for
  • Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
  • Drive. You‚Äôre extremely ambitious in everything you do‚Äîand your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high‚Äîand rising‚Äîbar.
  • Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You‚Äôre reliable, honest, and transparent.
  • Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.

What we offer
  • Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You‚Äôll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
  • An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential‚Äîthen, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.

Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
  • All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
TL;DR

We're building the next Netsuite/Odoo for the AI-age (an enterprise operations platform)
Founded by the team that scaled GitGuardian and talent.io
Backed by top-tier VCs (3M‚Ç¨ pre-seed)
Thrive in fast-paced AI-startup
Once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to join a tight-knit, world-class early team
Competitive salary plus equity ownership
Location: Remote (EU)




Why now?

Legacy ERPs can‚Äôt handle real-time decisions, AI-native workflows, or modern business speed.
SMEs need to move fast, but their outdated tools slow them down.
Agent frameworks are ready for real business use.




Why join us?

You'll help invent a new category of enterprise software with a small, elite team. The problems go far beyond CRUD: real-time orchestration, autonomous IA-agents, proactive interfaces. This is foundational work. Backed by ‚Ç¨3M from top-tier VCs (Daphni, Ovni, Motier ‚Ä¶) and top BA (Pennylane, Studapart..) we‚Äôre moving fast from zero to one.




What you‚Äôll build

The goal of our AI-native application is to have AI interfaces for most features

You‚Äôll take part in building:

Configuration agents to help users create their automation workflows, adapt the data model to their particular needs, enforce their processes
Data querying agents to extracts precise metrics and information
Data storage merging structured and unstructured data, to extract high level business insights.
Recommendation agents to make our software pro-active




What you bring

You should have experience in both backend web development and Machine learning, applying rigorous, data-driven research approaches to product feature building.

We want you to have the drive to build a new kind of software, less passive, more flexible; and help drive the agentic vision.

Backend expertise: Strong Python skills, databases, distributed systems, and async processing (Django/FastAPI a bonus).
Applied AI skills: Experience with the python machine learning ecosystem, NLP, agentic frameworks (we know it‚Äôs a recent field), complex RAG systems.
Ownership: You own features end to end, from design and development to deployment and user feedback. You‚Äôre comfortable talking to customers and iterating quickly.

Talent beats checklists. If you're intrigued, apply anyway.




How we work

Total ownership: End-to-end impact.
Zero bureaucracy: Small, agile team driving rapid execution.
Craft with velocity: We move fast by shipping small and never compromising on excellence.
Radical prioritization: One goal at a time, done right.
No egos: Feedback with recommendations can come from anyone, across any team.




What you get:

Competitive salary (‚Ç¨90k to ‚Ç¨120k/year) + meaningful equity.
Exceptional peers and a cutting-edge AI stack.
Ideal equipment and setup (top-tier gear, remote-friendly).
Regular company offsites (2‚Äì4 times per year) in inspiring locations.
Location: We have offices in Paris and Biarritz. You can also work fully remote, France (preferred)




Who‚Äôs building Piston?

We‚Äôre a tight-knit founding team that‚Äôs scaled from zero to growth before at talent.io and GitGuardian in the last 7 years. We've shipped product, built teams, and grown revenue from scratch. We work across product, engineering, and GTM as one unit, writing code, talking to users, and making the hard calls together. We‚Äôve lived the pain of ERP firsthand, and we‚Äôre building the product we wish we had. We bias for action, care deeply about craft, and know how to move fast without breaking trust.




Interview Process (max 2 weeks)

Intro call with Eric (CEO) ‚Äì 40 min
Technical deep dive with Eug√®ne (CTO) ‚Äì 90 min
Culture fit conversation with Florian (CRO) ‚Äì 30 min
Reference calls (2)
Paid 2-day assessment
Fast offer




This is the moment to shape what come next, not iterate on the past

Apply with a short note on why you're excited: founders@pistonhq.app

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
We are currently looking for a ‚ÄúData Scientist‚Äù to strengthen the Cronos Europa team.


This position requires a maximum of 5 days per month at client offices. However, teleworking must take place within 2 hours of Brussels.


Responsabilities:

  • Coordination and review of policy units‚Äô business needs;
  • Definition of solutions proposed for servicing policy units‚Äô business needs;
  • Interaction with the business analysts, customer, users, project leaders and the developers;
  • Carry out ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) tasks;
  • Creating, designing and developing data models;
  • Analyse large datasets and propose approaches for optimisation of reporting;
  • Assessment and quality control of data;
  • Preparation of statistical analysis of data for use by policy officers and other stakeholders;
  • Management and processing of data;
  • Reporting of key indicators for different policy fields on the basis of data sets available;
  • Development and maintenance of interactive dashboards in Power BI;
  • Assistance with data management aspects of IT projects developed.


Technical skills:

  • Data Analytics techniques and tools.
  • Power BI (including Power Query).
  • Experience with one or more of the following: Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, Languages like Visual Basic, SQL, Other business intelligence tools (SAP Business Objects, QlikSense, SAS‚Ä¶), ETL processes and tools (i.e. Azure Data Factory‚Ä¶).
  • SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL).
  • Architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores.
  • Knowledge in one of the following areas: predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems.


Profile:

  • Bachelor's degree minimum
  • English fluent
  • Ability to integrate in multicultural environment, team player, discretion, integrity, problem solving.


Why Cronos Group?

We‚Äôll propose you:

  • An attractive salary package
  • A good work-life balance environment
  • The assurance of working in cutting-edge technologies in an entrepreneurial spirit.
  • The opportunity to develop your skills thanks to tailor-made training courses according to your needs
  • A good job in a friendly place

If you wish to integrate a dynamic structure on a human scale while working with the latest technologies, don't wait anymore and join Cronos!

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Role: Machine Learning / AI Engineer ‚Äì Fully remote in Europe




I'm urgently hiring for a Senior Machine Learning / AI Engineer on behalf of a leading media organisation. They‚Äôre expanding their platforms around content creation and require immediate support to manage increasing demand through Q3 & Q4 2025, and into 2026.




You will need experience in LLM‚Äôs and speech to text and sentiment analysis. The business are not using anything specific so experience working with a range of tools and selecting the right models is a large focus.




The business are around 500 employees across Europe and have been founded almost 10 years. This is almost a build out of there ML capabilities so somebody who can scale out ML processes would be great.

Proven expertise in Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence
Hands-on experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) & signal extraction / semantic analytics
Needs experience working on recommendation systems
Strong data extraction capabilities
Solid experience building production-ready systems and AWS infrastructure
Technical leadership or senior-level experience highly desirable

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
